title: Stormzy 'in talks for Celebrity Come Dine With Me' and we need this
text:
Stormzy is reportedly in talks for Celebrity Come Dine With Me (Picture: Getty Images)

Stormzy is said to be in talks for a celebrity version of Come Dine With Me that is set to air at Christmas.

The rapper is a big fan of the show, and Channel 4 is keen on getting him to show off his skills in the kitchen for real.

But being one of the hottest artists around right now means he might not be able to find the time to film an episode.

A source told The Sun: ‘Everyone’s really keen to sign big names for the show’s comeback – and as a fan, it’d be amazing to get Stormzy. No-one knows if he’ll actually have the time to film it, though.’

The Big For Your Boots singer has said in the past that he would be bothered about winning, he would just be happy to a part of the show.

Advertisement

Advertisement

He said on Capital Breakfast: ‘When I watch it – do you know what? I can’t lie. I’m a proper fan, like, I love my food. So I’ll watch Come Dine with Me and just proper think, “Ah, I’d just love to, like, be there eating the food.”

Stormzy loves getting in the kitchen (Picture: Instagram)

‘I wouldn’t mind losing. I’d just do the three other meals and then when people come to me it’s like, “guys, listen, I can’t lie, I’m just here for the meals you lot did. Let’s just order some flippin’ Deliveroo or something.”‘

We like to think Stormz would do a bit more than just grab a takeaway.

Past Celebrity Come Dine With Me contestants have included TV presenter Ulrika Jonsson, EastEnders star Laila Morse and actress Lesley Joseph.

The format of the show sees contestants go round to each other’s houses for dinner before rating each three course meal out of 10.

Channel 4 and Stormzy’s camp have been contacted for comment.

description: Stormzy 'in talks for Celebrity Come Dine With Me' and we need this like air
